overview: He was an 80s movie star and Indonesia's answer to Sylvester Stallone, but can New Zealander Peter O'Brian realise his unfulfilled potential and return to the big screen after being missing-in-action for 20 years? OPERATION: RAMBU. is Peter's story as he tells it and a look at his attempts to step back into the limelight.
title: Operation: RAMBU!
